generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Open+Sans:wght@300;400&display=swap");*{box-sizing:border-box;padding:0;margin:0}body{font-family:Open Sans,sans-serif;background:#fff;color:#333;line-height:1.6}ul{list-style:none}.btn{text-decoration:none}p{margin:10px 0;font-weight:300;line-height:1.2}.navbar,img{width:100%}.navbar{display:flex;flex-wrap:wrap;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between;background-color:#242424;color:#fff;opacity:.8;position:fixed;top:0;padding:0 30px;z-index:10}.navbar a{color:#fff;padding:10px 20px;margin:5px;text-decoration:none}.navbar a:hover{border-bottom:2px solid #28a745;background-color:grey;transition:.5s}.navbar ul{display:flex}.navbar .logo{font-weight:400}.hamburger{background-color:transparent;border:0;display:none;color:#fff;font-size:20px;cursor:pointer}.hamburger:focus{outline:none}.hamburger i:hover{border-bottom:2px solid #28a745;background-color:grey;transition:.5s}.hero{background-image:url(https://media.defense.gov/2014/Jul/16/2000832464/780/780/0/140715-F-MI136-027.JPG);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:50%;background-size:cover;height:100vh;position:relative;color:#fff}.hero:before{content:"";position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;background:rgba(0,0,0,.6)}.hero *{z-index:10}.hero .homeContainer{display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;justify-content:center;text-align:center;height:100%}.hero .home p{font-size:20px;max-width:600px;margin:auto;font-weight:400}.hero .home h1{font-size:15px;max-width:600px;margin:20px 0 30px;font-weight:50}.hero .contactContainer{display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;justify-content:center;text-align:center;height:100%}.hero .contact h2{font-size:25px;max-width:600px;margin:auto;font-weight:500}.hero .contact p{font-size:20px;max-width:600px;margin:20px 0 30px;font-weight:400}.hero .contact hr{overflow:visible;height:30px;border:solid #fff;border-width:1px 0 0;border-radius:20px}a{color:#fff}.hero .aboutContainer{display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;justify-content:center;text-align:center;height:100%}.hero .about h2{font-size:25px;max-width:600px;margin:auto;font-weight:500}.hero .about p{font-size:20px;max-width:600px;margin:20px 0 30px;font-weight:400}.hero .about hr{overflow:visible;height:30px;border:solid #fff;border-width:1px 0 0;border-radius:20px}.hero .loginContainer{display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;justify-content:center;text-align:center;height:100%}.hero .login h2{font-size:25px;max-width:600px;margin:auto;font-weight:500}.hero .login hr{overflow:visible;height:30px;border:solid #fff;border-width:1px 0 0;border-radius:20px}.loginGroup{width:100%;margin-top:0}.loginGroup input{width:100%;padding:5px}.hero .register{display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;justify-content:center;text-align:center;height:100vh;padding:100px;line-height:2.5}.hero .register h2{font-size:25px;max-width:600px;margin:auto;font-weight:500}.hero .register hr{overflow:visible;height:30px;border:solid #fff;border-width:1px 0 0;border-radius:20px;width:100%}.registerGroup{display:flex;height:30px;justify-content:space-between;margin:10px 15px;width:93%}@media screen and (max-width:800px){.navbar ul{display:none;width:100%;flex-direction:column}.navbar ul.show{display:flex}.navbar a:hover{border:1px solid #28a745;border-radius:10px;padding:5px;transition:.8s}.hamburger{display:block}.btn,.logo{width:100%}.navbar{padding:0}}#status{width:100%;max-width:500px;margin-top:10px;text-align:center;padding:0;border-radius:8px}#status.success{background-color:#28a745}#status.error,#status.success{animation:status 4s ease forwards}#status.error{background-color:#f51919}@keyframes status{0%{opacity:1;pointer-events:all}90%{opacity:1;pointer-events:all}to{opacity:0;pointer-events:none}}
